title: Underrepresented in tech, Latinas are using TikTok to help others navigate the industry - NBC News
content: Underrepresented in tech, Latinas are using TikTok to help others navigate the industry  NBC News
description: “At the end of the day, we’re all breaking glass ceilings, we’re all carving our own path,” said Gina Moreno, who works at Microsoft as a program manager.
